name: Piloswine
flavorText:
Because the long
hair all over its
body obscures its sight, it just
keeps charging
repeatedly.

previous.name: Swinub
previous.flavorText:
It rubs its snout
on the ground to
find and dig up food. It sometimes
discovers hot
springs.

next.name: Corsola
next.flavorText:
It continuously
sheds and grows.
The tip of its head is prized as
a treasure for its
beauty.

pokemon.name: Swinub

on the ground to
find and dig up food. It sometimes
discovers hot

pokemon.name: Mamoswine
pokemon.flavorText:
Its impressive tusks are made of
ice. The population thinned when it
turned warm after the ice age.
